name: Desolate Realms
description: Desolate Realms is a top down horde mode, survival game with tons of content. Multiple maps and weapons to explore and discover while facing multiple types of enemies. New challenges are created for each run to keep goals in mind when attempting to level up.

name: Dark is the Void
description: Dark is the Void is a combat focused JRPG-inspired roguelike, featuring fast paced, menu-driven battles. Build, customize, and optimize your party of four from a mix of 24 unique classes, spanning a range from Tanks, Healers, DPS, and every hybrid in between.

name: CrystalKeepers Tower Defense
description: Immerse yourself in an epic yet whimsical journey to defend the crystals from hordes of enemies, each more broken-down than the next, with a whole arsenal of tricks! Fight on the plains, mountains, swamps, deserts and many others by adapting your strategy.

name: Crescent Quest: Y2K Home Expansion
description: A room with a Y2K aesthetic for your Crescent Quest home and a few wallpapers for your device!

name: Christmas Rocket Pudding
description: A fast-paced 3D platform game. Skillfully control the speed of your pudding to beat the levels fast while avoiding pitfalls!

name: Another Earth
description: We make a highly enjoyable virtual world, where players have the opportunity to be creators, allowing them the tools and ability to expand the world, and create their own stories and meaningful experiences for other players in the evolving world.

name: Anthem#9
description: Combine Gems to unleash Skills in ANTHEM#9, a deck-building rogue-lite puzzle-battler! Customize your Recipes for a wide variety of deck ideas, and explore the thrilling story of secret agents fighting for world order.

name: Apu's Journey
description: Apu's Journey is a retro action RPG, you can complete dungeons, defeat creatures, collect items, and improve your skills!

name: Ball of Poo
description: Help Dung Beetle Chan get the dung ball to the goal!

name: James' Fun House: Episode 1
description: You are a member of an elite strike team employed by the Japanese Americans Against Anime (J.A.A.A). Your mission is to prevent James the Dark Messiah of Anime aka. Jami Kun from releasing real life anime upon the universe. You will infiltrate James' stronghold (The Fun House), combat his cult of anime worshippers and alien allies, rescue hostages, and put an end to the threat of James forever.

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Battle Pass 2023 Autumn Bundle Part 2
description: Experience the ultimate autumn adventure with our new Battle Pass, featuring a progression up to 55 levels with exciting rewards!

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Battle Pass 2023 Autumn Part 2
description: Experience the ultimate autumn adventure with our new Battle Pass, featuring a progression up to 55 levels with exciting rewards!

name: A Date with Death: Expansion DLC
description:
The expansion DLC for A Date with Death includes:

- Extra character customization options (five hair fronts, five hair backs, three fem outfits + recolors, four masc outfits + recolors, and 13 accessories)
- Adds extra choices and conversations throughout all days (find the ★ symbol!)
- Adds one additional ending (including a new CG!)

name: ADHD Arena
description: Let your ADHD loose and stack gems to accumulate points and get to higher more rewarding tiers, get the highest score you can by pushing gems around to organize and combine them and get lost in the joys of creating chaos the putting it into order.

name: Huggy: Love and Rescue
description: Huggy: Love and Rescue is an unofficial platformer puzzle game based on Poppy Playtime. The game features Huggy Wuggy, who has to save Kissy Missy from being captured. The aim of the game is to go through every level, avoid the obstacles and save Kissy Missy.

name: Truck Simulator: Driving School 2024
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Dinorex
description:
Dinorex is a fighting game released by TAITO in 1992.
Choose from 6 available dinosaurs and do battle to win the amazoness queen, and the title of Dino Rex: the king of the land!
Acquiring various types of egg-shaped items and weapons can give you an advantage in a battle.

name: Euro Truck Driver Simulator
description: Open-world Truck Simulator! Discover Europe driving one of the most common European trucks!

name: Lake: Special Delivery
description: Take a trip back to the 1980's and visit the beautiful lakeside town of Providence Oaks, deliver their mail, and meet its charming residence. This bundle includes the base game, Lake, and its festive holiday-themed prequel, Lake: Season's Greetings.

name: Madden NFL 24: Michael Vick 20th Anniversary Edition
description: Get the Michael Vick Edition* to stack your Ultimate Team with Vick's favorite players.

name: Super Classics HD Bundle
description: Contains the games: Green Soldiers Heroes + Super Snaker Block DX

name: Teardown: Ultimate Edition
description:
Prepare the perfect heist in this simulated and fully destructible voxel world. Tear down walls with vehicles or explosives to create shortcuts. Stack objects to reach new heights. Use the environment to your advantage in the most creative way you can think of.

Teardown: Ultimate Edition includes
Teardown
Teardown: Season Pass
Quilez R0113R Robot - A spawnable, transformable robot vehicle equipped with destructive weapon systems and a grappling hook.

name: Bowser's Revenge
description: A romhack for SMW with 67 exits

name: List-Runner
description: a play jam 4 game

name: Kabufuda
description: A kabufuda solitaire game, inspired by Zachtronics, rebuilt + enhanced for playdate

name: Hoodgang Simulator
description: An open world game crafted in an artistic voxel style. Riveting in a resplendent American metropolis, players can take on a wide array of tasks, trigger random events, or relish the thrill of blazing races and intriguing shootouts.

name: Heartwell
description: A souls-like 2D action RPG platformer with metroidvania-style level design, branching paths, cute graphics, and challenging but rewarding combat. Play as Dorothy Heartwell on her journey to find her way home in a gripping, sci-fi fantasy adventure!

name: Dusty Derby
description: Dusty Derby is a large online multiplayer party royal game with 32 players. Cute Dusts Compete to be King of Dusts in various places in the house!

name: Devil Slot Machine
description: On a cursed slot machine, you engage in a deadly game of souls with the demons. Devil Slot Machine is a roguelike pigeon tower defense game. Purchase chips as defensive towers and release elemental bullets to destroy your enemies. Enjoy the exhilarating feeling of annihilating demons!

name: Clock Stopper
description: What would you do if you can stop the time? Be the master of time? Or do some crazy things that you've never done?

name: Art is Boom
description: Let's create the art of explosions—different characters, different bombs. It's about the art of detonation and the creativity of crafting new bombs. Dive into the joyous game of various explosions!

name: Bowser's Revenge 2
description: This is just a regular standard hack, and it's about what you could expect from Standard: Hard and have 68 exits.

name: Super Mario World 3: A Whole New World
description:
A romhack for SMW with 5 Worlds and 8 Levels in each world!
It starts off easy, but gets harder near the end.
I don't really know what else to write here...

name: Golden Yoshi's Island
description:
Golden Yoshi's Island is a ROM Hack of Yoshi's Island built to be played for live audiences in a speedrunning setting. It's a modified version of SMW2+2 by Golden Yoshi (with his full consent).

This hack features several optimizations to make it a faster run than its source material, based on feedback from the Yoshi speedrunning community:

-36 levels hand-picked from the original ROM Hack's 50 and rearranged into 4 worlds.
-Default egg aim setting is now Hasty
-Transformation sequence has been sped up
-World-clear cutscene has been removed
-Message box upon collecting first flower has been removed
-Autoscrolling sections removed
-New tech to skip vehicle sections
-Various other sections of levels have been modified for brevity and consistency
-Entering the top secret code now triggers the credits sequence
-Brand new title screen and credits sequence, courtesy of Mattrizzle

name: Doom: Damnation
description:
Doom: Damnation (DDAMN10.WAD) is a full four-episode replacement vanilla megawad, for The Ultimate Doom. It was released in February 2021, following an initial three-episode release in November 2016. It was designed by Ofisil, who also composed the soundtrack for it.
This mapset acts as a retelling of the original events that unfolded in The Ultimate Doom; the maps are designed with traditional gameplay in mind, combining action, exploration and atmosphere on abstract and semi-realistic environments, with the custom made OST occasionally adding a slight horror vibe.

name: Theme-Gawad: A Doom II Megawad
description: Welcome fellow DOOMers. What you can see here is a labour of love from a variety of mappers, beginner to pro. The concept behind it? Each mapper has taken a specific theme, and then tried to make something nice looking, but also fun, within specific confines. This Doom II megawad is divided between chapters of varying difficulty, with each chapter using specific monsters and enemies, with the purpose of the whole thing feeling like a gradually more challenging adventure. While this is playable from pistol-start, it is mean to be experienced continuously in UV as it has been balanced for that purpose and that purpose alone.

name: The Devious Four Chronicles 4: Hunter's Revenge ReVised
description:
After stopping the alien duo known as Hunter and Scorpion from ending the world via the Furnace, an alien doomsday device which was constructed in the center of their crash landing site, the Mushroom Kingdom rebuilt.

With peace once again prevalent, Mario must now travel to the neighboring distant kingdom of Hyrule to announce the Mushroom Kingdom's presence as a peaceful one. However, on his journey, Mario meets a rather strange individual, who tells the even stranger story of a recent foe who might not be so dead after all.

A romhack with 107 exits

name: The Devious Four Chronicles 3: The Crater
description:
A romhack with 100 exits

Mario has bested the King Koopa, Bowser, time and time again. He has stopped boos from taking over and even giant frogs. However, not long ago, he foiled the attempt of two otherworldly beings named Racter and Magna, from distorting his world's magnetic field. Mario bested Racter, but not before he could call for help.

Mario must now face off against an enemy like no other he has seen... two enemies! He must be quick, for they have built a devious super weapon that could very well turn the Mushroom Kingdom and more into nothing more than a parking lot! He's not alone though, traveling with him is yet another otherworldly being who seems to know the two villains.

name: Hunter and Scorpion's Bet ReVised: Hunter's Path
description:
Hunter and Scorpion have set out on a bet for something called the Golden Dollar. You play as Hunter in this version of the refreshed original of Hunter's Path. Hack can be a bit demanding.

Romhack with 27 exits

name: The Tape
description:
You have till 3am to escape the hotel or they they will come.

Watch tapes, progress and find a way out before it is to late...

Can you break the cycle?

name: Super Mario: Hunter's Revenge 3
description: A romhack for SMW with 58 exits

name: Forza Customs
description: Forza Customs is a mobile car-themed puzzle game developed by Hutch Games Ltd. Players will solve puzzles to help design, customize, and tune a car specifically to the players liking. Restore iconic cars from paint to body parts to create the ultimate car. Forza Customs is available now for iOS and Android.

name: H&SB2: Twilight Gem - Hunter's Quest
description: The second Demo of Hunter's Quest, featuring five new worlds and a lot of new levels for Hunter and his "ego" to traverse through. Follow the funny story of Hunter and his ridiculous quest to obtain power and be better than his pal, Scorpion! But beware, a third opponent may show up to steal the glory all for himself.

name: The Devious Four Chronicles 6: The Fourth Sector
description:
Mario and Sonic have earned a well deserved vacation from the Devious Four's attacks. Sonic decides to have a normal adventure with Mario. Instead, they find a whole new world filled with wonders, bombs, and a strange creature called Sectorial. Unfortunately, trouble is brewing in the dimension between dimensions, and it's not to be taken lightly.

This romhack has 102 exits.

name: Hunter & Scorpion's Bet Saga: Scorpion's Ravage
description:
Legend has it that a precious relic known only as the Golden Dollar is in existance. Legend has it that whom so-ever is owner of the Dollar, they shall be richer than the richest man alive! There are pricess that need to paid in order to have this exchange of money. Both Hunter and SCORPION hear of the news and make a bet. "I bet that I can get to it faster than you can!" SCORPION tells Hunter. "Ha," Hunter starts, "really? You are ON."

By those very words, 2 epic and exciting adventures are launched for the priceless relic. Join SCORPION as you storm through lands ravaging and destroying the people of villages, causing solar eclipses, and storming through castles. Help SCORPION pass the ruthless terrian of an indigo crystallyne, a barren sky, a tall mountain, and an active volcano... all to end with a battle of epic proportions! This is the hack of a life time!

This romhack has 62 exits

name: Pokémon Verde Musgo
description:
Have you ever imagined traveling across two continents and their provinces? Go by rocket to Mars? How about visiting the city of Prypiat and the famous Chernobyl plant? Fight crime and the terrible Illuminatis? Walking across a continent completely dominated by a criminal organization? Meet eccentric personalities, such as: Captain Nascimento, Elton John, Harry Potter, Hercules, Master Yoda, Al Capone, the living dead in the Pet Cemetery, etc.?

Yes, now you can! VERDE MOSS, a fantastic hack, with all available Pokémon, 135 new moves, where the player takes on the role of a police officer disguised as a trainer and investigates criminal organizations across the continents of Ruroro and Urara.

A long game, with a high level of difficulty, with several post-games, extras, missions, events from the creators (in the style of Nintendo events), completely new events and others based on films, special battle towers, with prizes, in addition to of two world tournaments.

name: Alice's Stew
description: Join Alice on a stewpendous adventure to find Ingredients all over her home town for her stew. Navigate through challenges, solve puzzles, and engage with a cast of charming characters who offer both help and hindrance on Alice's flavorful mission. Keep an eye out for mischievous culinary critters and clever obstacles that stand between Alice and her savory goal. With each ingredient collected, you unlock new levels of culinary creativity, allowing Alice to experiment with different recipes and enhance the flavor profile of her stew.

name: Nettai Teikiatsu Shoujo
description: Nettai Teikiatsu Shoujo is an visual novel, developed and published by Oaks Soft, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Chicocos S.A.
description:
Chicocos S.A. is a limit-removing map (complevel 2) set in a shipping/receiving office, featuring a non-linear layout with multiple paths to get to your goal.

Clear out all the buildings and pick up all 3 keys to get into the boss arena: the theater hall...!! (which, fun fact, is a recreation of the actual theater hall where the graduation ceremony will take place!). This is a commemorative map for my highschool graduation.

name: Vanilium
description: This is a simple map, made in roughly 8 hours with speedrunning in mind. This level has also been built and tested with Nightmare! difficulty and is easily beatable. Can you find the fastest exit route?

name: 10x1024
description: Inspired by LunchLunch's 10x10 Project and the Doomworld 1024 community projects, I decided to mash the two concepts together like chocolate and peanut butter.

name: Colour of Ineptation
description: 2 medium to short maps that I made after coming back from my summer vacation back to Taiwan and Japan

name: Didaskalia
description: It's year 1989, you are tired of your life, everything and everyone pisses you off. One day you decide to join the army, as a combat medic. You and your companions are sent to "Phobos". The mission is to get rid of the monsters that took control of the planet. You arrive a bit late, because you had some work to do. Every soldier brutally dies, you are left all alone. You hear in the radio that people from earth have sent help to rescue you. But soon it turns out that they want you DEAD.

name: Doomed: By the Hour
description: A full megawad of speedmaps that were (mostly!) made in an hour or less, for NaNoWADMo 2022! The standard 30 maps are split evenly between us, with Map31 being a collaboration and Map32 being a guest map by gabirupee!

name: Doomed: By the Hour 2
description: Doomed: By The Hour 2 is a megawad with 32 speedmaps created between 1-3 hours by finnks13 & Yumheart, with a special guest map by gabirupee. Maps are generally pretty short & violent, with a nice slaughtery finale in the last two episodes being generally equivalent to Speed of Doom.

name: Exoterrestrial
description: Exoterrestrial is a set of 5 MBF21-compatible maps that use Tango's Minicharge mod (You DON'T need to download it separately). The maps are mostly easy and pretty different from NoReason's standard fare, with the only exception of the final fight of map05.

name: Unternity
description: A map pack of short, linear maps. Episode One is Underclaustro, underground maps which you'll see skybox less often, hence claustrophobic. Episode Two is Unlifely, Snow maps, out doors, concrete building surrounded by heavy snows.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Fiammetta Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Laterano civilization with its Leader Fiammetta.
Playing as her gives you:

- Unique district (Laterano Notarial Hall)
- Unique buildings (Tower of Revelations & Requiem Church)
- Unique unit (Apostolic Gun Knights)
- Unique city project (Summit of Nations)
- Unique governors (Mostima & Lemuen)
- And much more!

name: Satisfactory: Update 8
description: New Power Tower & Priority Power Switch buildings, new advanced game settings, improvements to blueprints, biomes and more.

name: Super Mario 64 in SuperTux
description: Super Mario 64 in SuperTux is a modified version of SuperTux which incorporates Mario using his moveset from Super Mario 64 into SuperTux using libsm64.

name: Banana Quest
description: Banana Quest is a simple but challenging game where you must collect the Sacred Bananas, which were stolen, through seven levels of pure fun and excitement.

name: Space Battle Meteor
description:
"Space Battle Meteor" is an exciting game filled with cosmic adventures and intense combat. In this thrilling arcade, you take on the role of a space pilot whose mission is to protect the shuttle from meteorites and enemy spacecraft.

You'll need to maneuver among the stars and destroy approaching meteorites using the full arsenal of your space weapons. Beware of enemy shuttles that will attempt to disrupt your mission and interfere with delivering your shuttle to a safe location.

However, your spacecraft is not left defenseless. Upgrade your ship, improve weapons, and defense systems to become even more powerful and effective in combating threats from space. With each level passed, your experience and skills will grow, unlocking new possibilities for your cosmic adventure.

name: Car Race
description: Car Race is a simple racing game. The objective of the game is to race on a single track, evading other cars and collecting fuel on the ground. The longer the player can last, the higher the score.

name: Midway
description: Below your fighter, you have spotted a fleet of enemy warships. Your airfleet has only three fighters. You find yourself preparing for a life or death battle that can only begin right now. The enemy battleship has already begun to attack with full power. How much success will you have in defeating the enemy fleet?

name: Eclipse
description: Fight lots of different enemies in the battle to save the universe from the mighty evil Lord Tooblac.

name: Doctor Who: Time Vortex
description: Can you keep the TARDIS in motion and prevent it from slipping past your defence and out of the time vortex? Use your arrow keys, buttons or swipe to move the paddle.

name: R-Type II
description:
R-Type II now available on iPhone, iPad & Android devices!

Two years after R-Type, the Bydo Empire is back! Man your spaceship and take on the Bydo with new weapons (Search Laser & Shotgun Laser) and a new bomb type. Collect a plethora of items and powers-up across various improved sets and make your way to the top of the leaderboard!

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Invasions - Season of The Spectre
description: Invasions is a dynamic single player campaign with a variety of distinct challenges. With built in progression and RPG mechanics, mixed with MK1’s incredible fighting action, Invasions provides deep, and engaging challenges, and a ton of rewards along the way.

name: The Dark is a Soft, Warm Pressure
description: Sin descripción

name: Oneirology Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Grog
description: Grog is a roguelike game directly inspired by having played the original Rogue on a real PDP-11 during Roguelike Celebration 2018.

name: Evil Elves II Deluxe
description:
The Evil Elves are back at it again with a brand new remake, just in time for the holiday season!
Evil Elves II Deluxe is a remake of Evil Elves II, a game once available on Zeeks and Funschool.

name: Sonic Free Riders: No Kinect Patch
description: No Kinect Patch is a mod for Sonic Free Riders that completely changes the way the game is controlled and played and quickly became the definitive way for people to experience Sonic Free Riders. This patch allows the game to be played with controller, eliminating the need for a kinect.

name: Panel Room: Escape Game
description:
You are trapped in "SOMEWHERE". Solve all the mysteries and escape from here.

This game is different from ordinary escape games in that you are trying to escape by solving the rules of the room.

At first, you may not understand what is going on, but if you do certain things, the whole picture of the room will be revealed little by little.

Aim to escape while understanding the rules of the room little by little.

name: Rumble Club
description:
Fall into the physics-based massive multiplayer Battle Royale! Join the epic knockout madness with up to 20 clumsy players and punch, push, throw, or trick opponents out of the arena!

Fly in on Captain Punch’s Sky Yacht, get bopped into the arena, find silly Gadgets to battle with, and survive the dropping floor and shrinking battlefield to be the last player standing! Are you ready to punch your way to victory and become the ultimate champion?

name: Escape From Flea Market Montgomery
description: Escape from Sammy Stephens before he catches you and takes you to Flea Market Montgomery which, allegedly, is "just like a mini mall".

name: Rushing Beat: Translation
description: Rushing Beat was released outside Japan as Rival Turf!, but its story was changed in this release. This rom hack allows you to play the original version of the game in English (keeping the story, character names and some other aspects).

name: Realm of the Mad God Exalt
description: Team up with dozens of players and battle through the Realm of the Mad God, Oryx. With a retro 8-bit style, Realm is an evolution of traditional MMO gameplay.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Shinra Pack
description:
A mod that adds 2 leaders, alongside the Shinra civilization. President Shinra as a leader grants you massive discounts to upgrading units, while Rufus gives you bonuses to wall protection and siege units production. The civilization bonus are as follows:

- Unique building (Mako Reactor)
- Unique unit (1st Class Soldier)
- Unique agenda (Industrialist)
- And much more!

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Super Mario Leaders Pack
description: A mod that adds 3 unique Mario themed civilizations (Mushroom Kingdom, Koopas and Sarasaland) with 3 unique leaders (Peach, Bowser and Daisy). Leaders are fully 3D animated with their own custom background music, and unique visuals from both units and governors. If Hero Mode is enabled, 2 new heroes are also available: Mario & Luigi.

name: Ghosteez
description: Collect coins and unlock characters with special abilities (characters will come in v1.0) in order to get more coins to discover more ways of levelling up your characters, finding treasures and defending enemies (v1.0 feature)

name: Super Super Fun World
description: Super Super Fun World is a small but weird 15 minute indie exploration game.

name: Tricky Taps
description: Use the levers to roll and bounce the ball along the twisty roads, without letting it drop or hit the spikes! Keep an eye out for tons of super-cool and tricky obstacles to jump and bounce out off or avoid.

name: Tricky Taps: Paint Power
description: Sin descripción

name: Two Point Campus: Brainy Bundle
description:
For the truly studious, may we present an exciting limited-time offer crammed with all the extra tuition you could ever wish to stuff into your noggin. This collection of DLC and the base game is available in this awesome new value bundle, giving you the ultimate Campus experience, be it exploring brave new frontiers in Space Academy, or visiting the Lifeless Estate and getting all spooky in School Spirits, and the latest set of medical course mayhem in Medical School!

So if you're new to the game and want to try out everything Two Point Campus has to offer, grab your prospectus and join the brainy bunch today!

name: The King of Fighters XIII: Global Match: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: ASMR Slicing: Joyful Cutting DLC
description: Unlock new unique objects to slice, new funny blades to cut with and get extra coins to spend!

name: ASMR Slicing: Nice Cuts DLC
description: Unlock new unique objects to slice, new funny knifes to cut with and get extra coins to spend!

name: Astro Miner
description: Fly to extraordinary planets with different terrains and start mining valuable minerals to sell them in your base. Create corridors to reach stacks of crystals, or do it your own way and mine wherever you like with the help of dynamites. Hire workers and build an auto-miner machine to speed up your work!

name: Astro Miner: Moons
description: Explore 12 moons and collect all the treasures using your new vehicles!

name: Attack Strategy: Battle Simulator Accurate
description: Precision and Power Unite – Master the Battlefield!

name: Tobari Dream Ocean + Nightmare
description:
For those of you who want to experience the best of both worlds, the sea of fun and the sea of nightmares, this is the place. A 2D action game with various magic 'Tobari Dream Ocean' and Nightmarish additional content 'Tobari Dream Ocean Nightmare' bundle!

Tobari Dream Ocean is a side-scrolling action game in which players clear stages while acquiring various kinds of magic from enemies.

Tobari Dream Ocean Nightmare, dive into a nightmarish addition with ' Tobari Dream Ocean' – now featuring nightmarish versions of all stages!

Nightmare is a game that CANNOT be recommended to any normal gamer. For those who have conquered all of Tobari Dream Ocean's main stages and crave even greater challenges, this content is tailored for the true daredevils!

name: Toasterball + Buissons Bundle
description: Enjoy two couch games with this bundle!

name: Sunsoft Mahjong Solitaire: Shanghai Legend
description: The 30-Year King of Puzzle Games: Shanghai

name: Spacefarer Mahjong
description: Spacefarer Mahjong is a classic Mahjong game with multiple play modes and styles.

name: Spacefarer Solitaire
description: Spacefarer Solitaire is a beautifully designed and animated classic game for Nintendo Switch, with excellent replay value.

name: Pestersim
description: The complete MSPA Reader Saga in one bundle - Hiveswap Friendsim and Pesterquest

name: Snap Together
description:
Snap Together is a puzzle party game for up to 4 people on a single console! Assemble models with your friends or by yourself.

Play with your friends in Multiplayer mode and solve puzzles together or challenge them in Tournament mode. In Tournament mode, there is only one winner! Use power-ups to mess up other players and win.

name: Heavy Car Battle: Demolition Derby
description: Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of our survival project – a fierce battle for 2 vital points and your very survival! You will have only one mission: collect 2 points scattered randomly across the battleground while dodging, crashing, and outwitting rival vehicles.

name: Drawing Carnival
description:
Unleash your inner artist and create gorgeous paintings made in different art styles!

Grab your neon markers, spray paints, stick-on diamonds or glitter powder and use them to create amazing masterpieces!

Divide your favorite portrait or any painting into four parts. Choose what you're going to paint with, decide which colors you're going to use, create a perfect image and put the painting in a frame to sell it!

name: Draw & Color Maze: Paint Labyrinth Puzzle
description: An exciting puzzle game in which you and a snail will have to go to a mysterious labyrinth and paint it with magic paint!

name: Drawing Carnival: Anime Style
description: Sin descripción

name: Drawing Carnival: Horror Style
description: Sin descripción

name: Math, BFF, and Notes
description: Married women are the only women for me!

name: Sugar Lust
description: Embark on a journey through the realm of the cake. As you progress through a series of intricately designed puzzles, you'll encounter a diverse cast of charming heroes and heroines. Upgrade your characters and prepare to face off against the ruler of the land, the Demon Goddess

name: PSI
description: Civilization has never evolved past steam energy. A series of poorly maintained steam turbines keep society from collapse. An unexpected pressure buildup in the Turbine Core sends you on a adventure through the poorly maintained infrastructure.

name: Bloki
description: BLOKI is an educational game in which you'll transform into a designer of residential building facades from the Soviet era. Using the available set of tools and guidance from the moderator, you'll design facades and develop the nearby area.

name: Sex Milfs
description: Sex Milfs - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Siegebreaker
description: Conquer the realm using an arsenal of unique towers and enhancements. Battle through dense forests, arid deserts, frozen peaks, and volcanic hellscapes to overthrow the fallen gods.

name: Skuf Simulator
description: Skuf Simulator is a cooperative, humorous simulator of real life skuf, based on a popular meme. In the game, you and your friends can take on the role of a skuf and participate in various fun and absurd mini-games and contests.

name: Slot Shots Pinball: Ultimate Edition
description: Get ready for some good 'ol fashion pinball fun with eleven tables ready for you! Bigger playfields, better physics, longer soundtracks, and more slot machine shots! Prepare yourself for the ultimate edition of Slot Shots Pinball featuring four unreleased tables along with some classics.

name: Snake Galaxy Online
description: Snake Galaxy Online is a 3D game based on the famous Snake. Travel the universe, save the people of the stars and defeat evil in this fun adventure for all ages.

name: Space Detective: The Case of the Rebel Robot
description: Uncover cosmic conspiracies in "Space Detective: The Case of the Rebel Robot," a Sci-Fi Mystery Point-and-Click Adventure with a twist of Yuri Dating Sim. Solve the murder, present your case to the incoming Marshal, and navigate your choices to unlock unexpected lesbian romances!

name: Spiritus 2
description: The survival horror concludes in part two of SPIRITUS, set in a post-apocalyptic city and the depths of pure evil. Survive in classic 90's gaming tropes augmented with modern HD graphics.

name: Swappy World
description: Simply two mechanics: swipe to move and tap to interact in an open-world survival crafting experience made through cards. Handle your energy tactically to survive as long as possible. Craft weapons, build your base and be prepared to explore a world full of secrets.

name: Next Floor
description: Next Floor is a score attack, fast-paced, difficult, gory fps, with a simple objective, reach the highest floor you can. Take all your stress out on enemies and make the most creative kills to get as many points as possible, however, higher the floor, more difficult it will be. How far can you go?

name: Ninja Resurrection: A tale of Kuro
description: Explore "Ninja Resurrection," an intense martial arts game that takes a fresh approach to the genre. This hardcore adventure features a mysterious storyline, demanding combat, diverse moves, and thrilling QTEs. Conquer the challenge, evolve with the game, and become a true ninja master.

name: Northgard: Vordr, Clan of the Owl
description: Subsisting through the ages, the secretive norns of Vördr keep watch over all realms in Northgard and beyond. Protectors of Yggdrasil, the sisters Skuld, Verdandi, and Urdr, use the power of this sacred tree to spread their knowledge inexorably across the land.

name: Not Burned Evil
description: The attractive and terrifying game "Got Burned Evil" is an exciting 2D horror with a side view that immerses the player in a mysterious world of tragedies and riddles.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Back to the Future Special Pack
description: Great Scott! Crank that water pressure to 88 miles per hour and travel back in time to hose down iconic movie sets from the Back to the Future trilogy in five new maps for PowerWash Simulator!

name: Powers in the Basement
description: A short point-and-click adventure game set in a comedic medieval fantasy world, deliberately reminiscent of the great classics from the 80s / 90s, with a specific sweet spot for LucasArts production.

name: Plagueborn Survivor
description: Plagueborn Survior is a VRs only shooter game set in the present day, after a pandemic that collapsed the global economy, leaving everything in the hands of the military, criminal factions, and politicians.

name: Origin of Storms
description: Dive into Origin of Storms, a visually striking fighting game where elemental warriors clash in one-on-one or dynamic three-on-three battles. Unleash primal transformations, master distinct elemental powers, and compete globally for supremacy in this electrifying arena. Are you ready for the storm?

name: Prelude to Nuss Jump
description: Talking about the year 2022 Before the story of the Eastern Holy Son, we must first know this story When all the memory fragments are connected together, for him, there is only a devastating spiritual blow. But he must go through all this because This Everything is for a great mission!

name: RC Revolution: High Voltage
description: Immerse yourself in the electrifying world of RC car racing! Experience the thrill of multiplayer mayhem, delve into extensive car customization, unleash your creativity with track design, and embark on a rewarding progression system. Get ready, your track awaits!

name: Room
description: In ROOM players find themselves trapped in an unnerving and ever-shifting nightmare where escaping one room only leads to the discovery of another, each more sinister than the last.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Winter Whimsy
description: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Ultra-wide winter themed table with 2 plungers and multi-ball madness.

name: Same Day Delivery
description: Same Day Delivery is a game for people who enjoy fast-paced, responsive, arcade-like games. The game is a single player experience where players have to drive across the level and deliver packages.

name: Sanctuary in Time
description: A text-based, adult game with sci-fi & RPG elements!

name: TheKey
description: It is a multiplayer, competitive combat game with support for 8 players per game. Your objective is to obtain 3 keys and survive to create your own path to the helicopter on the map which is your victory point.

name: Rogue Glitch Ultra: Upgrade
description: A roguelite action platformer in a vibrant glitch-ridden world. Amass a huge arsenal from over 150 weapon options and face hordes of enemies and tough boss fights. Jump into multiplayer (up to 4 player co-op online or local) to collect, unlock, and upgrade for endless replayability.

name: Witchhammer
description:
Witchhammer is a Real-Time Roguelike Deckbuilding Game.
Play as Clovelin, a card reader who was convicted as a witch and made a deal with the devil to avenge her own death. With the powers of her magical tarot deck, you will battle the Inquisition and try to destroy their most powerful weapon: the Witchhammer.
To master our real time deckbuilding roguelike you will not only learn how to avoid your enemies attacks but also how to play your cards most efficiently.
After every wave of enemies you will improve your deck, making it more powerful and adapting it to your own playstyle.

name: Lilly's Potion Shop
description: A third-person shooter in a bright, colorful world, where dynamic battles are mixed with leisurely exploration of the world in search for ingredients, and a intricate plot. Feel like a wizard, thanks to the unusual mechanics of making potions.

name: Minigolf Galaxy: Green Valley
description: Start your galactical minigolf journey in Green Valley! With courses created by our golf-loving designer team, you will surely be put(t) to the test to finish with a 3-star performance.

name: Maze
description: Maze is a game that simulates you in a real maze environment. Without map navigation or guidance from any auxiliary tools, you will be completely lost in it. The only thing you can rely on is your own intuition and memory. Let's see how long it takes you to get out of the helpless maze.

name: Manifest Destiny
description: Tired of playing the hero of regular RPG game? This time, Let’s trying to play as a game developer, go deep into the game world created by yourself, kill or solve puzzles with your abilities of programming, art and music, all depends on you!

name: Magic Pussy: Chapter 2
description: Magic Pussy: Chapter 2 is an exciting visual novel designed for adults that will transport you to a magical world of fantasy. In this game, you will encounter a variety of magical characters, including humans, fauns, and fairies, all attending a school of magic.

name: My Dream Setup: Pets
description: Does your pet also live in your room? With the Pets DLC you can add animals, toys and accessories to your room. Choose your furry friend from the 16 breeds of dogs and cats featured in the DLC. In addition to dogs and cats, you can choose from fish, parrots, hamsters and even a lizard.

name: Monster Crawl: Warrior
description: FREE version of Monster Crawl featuring the Warrior & first few hours of gameplay || Horde based roguelite; slaughter them all with overpowering attacks & annihilate entire rooms. Explore diverse builds using heroes, abilities, buffs & relics. Beat Bosses to unlock Uber Relics. 2 player local co-op.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Megastructures
description: Advance to Type II civilization in Galactic Civilizations IV with the Megastructures expansion. Harness star power for awe-inspiring constructions like Dyson Spheres and Interstellar Gateways, each offering unique benefits. Think bigger and redefine your galactic scope!

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Species Pack
description: The Species Pack for Galactic Civilizations IV expands the game into the entire Milky Way via Subspace Streams. Featuring over a dozen unique species with new technologies and world-building aspects, it enhances gameplay and strategy.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Tales of Centauron
description: Explore the 24th-century Centauron sector in Galactic Civilizations IV's DLC, "Tales of Centauron." Discover unique tech, planetary upgrades, and ship parts. Enjoy new events and expanded gameplay for custom civilizations, enhancing both strategy and story in a dynamic universe.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Tales of the Arnor
description: Uncover ancient galaxy secrets in Galactic Civilizations IV's "Tales of the Arnor" expansion. Explore the lore of Mithilar and the Arnor, encountering relics and uncovering Precursor Wars history.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Warlords
description: Transform combat with custom military doctrines, controlling ship behavior and strategy. Set precise war aims and conquest goals with the War Planning interface, influencing public opinion. Enjoy enhanced combat, intricate ship designs, detailed reports, deepening strategic warfare.

name: Light In Blood
description: Descending into the world of dreams, you are immersed in the ominous atmosphere of the game "Light In Blood". The game is divided into two teams: victims and executioners. The task of the victims is to survive and get out of the coma, and the executioners are to stop them.

name: Kalis Car Game
description: Drive your car around open city. Outrun the police or chase down other street racers. Make money to tune your car and race it against other racer on touges and race tracks. Alone or with your friends. Use steering wheel & pedals, controller or keyboard and mouse. Enjoy the driving physics!

name: Into The Grid
description: Become a master hacker in this Cyberpunk Roguelike Deckbuilder. Explore the dangers of cyberspace and fight evil corporations. Build and upgrade a deck of powerful programs. Unlock perks and skills, and unleash digital hell on your enemies. Dive Into The Grid!

name: Hitler My Friend
description: Hitler My Friend is a 3D third-person shooter where you play as Hitler, fight off top shark predators and catch a turtle

name: Happy Hour Hero
description: Time is short, just like our signature cocktail. Will you make a stir and gain recognition as best bartender in town, or get mixed up and bottle it?

name: Gran Carismo
description: "Gran Carismo" immerses players in an intense and competitive racing environment, combining the excitement of illegal underground races with a compelling narrative. Get ready to navigate challenging tracks, outmaneuver rivals, and claim the grand prize – the Rosso 50

name: Glitch Daddy
description: You have a strange dream where you meet a creature named Glitch Daddy, telling you that the world is ending. Then, you wake up and go to unravel the truth through a wild, abstract psychedelic journey.

name: I Love You Freddy
description: ah the celebrity life, the fame, and glamour, the wealth, and the insane psychopathic fan girl who chases you around an island she trapped you in, isn't the celebrity life wonderful!

name: High Fructose
description: "High Fructose" is a first-person shooter roguelite. As a prophesied hero, wield up to five weapons against monstrous fruit. Use various traits and items to create builds and endure the relentless onslaught.

name: American Isekai: Legends of Nipponia
description: 250 years ago, on the world of Nipponia, twin siblings Taneela and Tanaka seek to become Adventurers like their father. On the day of their registration, they are contacted by Mavis, the Crystal being of their world. Can they gather enough forces to stand against the rising evil in their world?

name: Ancient Rus vs. Lizards
description: An action game about battles with hordes of aggressive humanoid lizards!

name: Ancient Stars
description: Ancient Stars is a 3V3 fair competitive MOBA game that is easy to learn, fast-paced, and strategic. It features a horizontal map with a single lane tower pushing mode, where the goal is to destroy the enemy base to win.

name: Assembly Line 2: Mobile Version
description: Build and optimize your assembly line to make the most money possible!

name: Bright Oak
description: Bright Oak is a heavily character-driven visual novel with elements of science fiction. Discover the tragic secrets behind Bright Oak’s preternatural dilemma; find friendship, or possibly love; save the town and make your way home--and if at first you don’t succeed, try, try again!

name: Brutalistick VR
description: The golden age of violent flash games now in your VR headset. Fully physics based combat with melee and firearms featuring copious amounts of blood, gore and destruction.

name: City Ambulance: Rescue Express
description: City Ambulance: Rescue Express is an open-world driving adventure game set in a climate-friendly future city. Hit the streets as Jakub & Mishra, our paramedic duo on duty to rescue locals. Face traffic, storms and more, the clock is ticking!

name: Company of Heroes 3: Hammer & Shield
description: The Hammer & Shield Expansion Pack introduces two new Battlegroups for Multiplayer/ Co-op / SP Skirmish, an all-new Campaign Company for the Italian Campaign, and four premium cosmetic bundles.

name: Corpse Master Carnage
description: Welcome to Corpse Master Carnage!A survivor round-based hell-shooter game where your objective is to survive endless hordes of demons while improving your attributes and gaining more power and new abilities, as well as exploring and progressing through the game's story.

name: Dark Dive: The Last Tropic
description: Join the ranks of skilled duppy detective in a Caribbean town where danger lurks at every corner. Catch or fight monsters, build your deck, and uncover the secrets of the town's mysterious mines in this captivating RPG with turn-based combat and gripping story elements.

name: Deadly Survival
description: Deadly Survival is an online survival horror game. Immerse yourself in the apocalyptic world of zombies, where every moment is a struggle for survival. A game for the real brave! The big world is filled with scary zombies.

name: Drum Legend
description: Drum Legend is a music rhythm game with multiple drumming gameplay options. In the 'Drum Maestro' mode,you can simulate a band drummer ,learn a variety of drumming skills, and play your favorite music.In the 'Rhythm Rush' mode, challenge yourself with more difficult tracks, aim for higher scores.

name: Die Cook
description: Presenting Die Cook, the first ever dice-based restaurant management game! Open your dream business, upgrade and equip your kitchen, level up employees to customize their dice. Express yourself with a customizable character and indoor decor. Aim for a 5-star rating in this unique relaxing simulator!

name: Detective Hayseed: The Cloning Madness
description: Join the crazy police detective Francis in his search for a kidnapped cloned beauty and go through countless escapades with him in this classic point & click adventure full of comedy.

name: DIY Paper Doll
description: Become a doll stylist and design fabulous outfits for your adorable paper princess!

name: Station 37
description: Make your way through a burning building and rescue!

name: Slave Zero X: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Slave Zero X is a stylish 2.5D character action game set in the biopunk world of Slave Zero (1999). Run & Slash your way through a dystopian future in this character action game which will resonate with fans of Devil May Cry, Strider, and Guilty Gear.

name: Naheulbeuk's Dungeon Master: Steward Edition
description: This bundle include Naheulbeuk Dungeon Master & its soundtrack.

name: Circut's Edge
description: Circut's Edge is a 1990 interactive roleplaying game where you play as detective Marîd Audran in a city sector called "The Budayeen", that is set in the Middle East and based on New Orleans.

name: Sky Fortress: Odyssey
description: Embark on a steampunk-style grand adventure where technology and fantasy merge, unveiling the secrets of the world of Setsemir!

name: Pure Nastalgia
description: This one of a kind gem provides you with the opportunity to sample most if not all of your favorite Super Mario Bros. games. Many of the greatest and most brilliant level designs ever invented from previous SMB titles have been selected, reimagined, and added to this unforgettable compendium to provide a brand new, fun and nostalgic experience for the family. This 38 level anthology is far more than simply a compilation as it also features custom level designs as well as hidden warp zones and coin rooms.

name: Atari Flashback 2+
description: It includes 20 classic Atari 2600 games and 20 new Atari games. The game lineup is mostly the same as the original Flashback 2. However, games such as Pitfall!, River Raid, and Wizard do not appear, and are instead replaced by sports games.

name: Blue Mushrooms
description:
Blue Mushrooms is a SMB1 Rom Hack that modifies some stuff of the original game.

Plot: Now that Bowser was defeated, there’s one more thing Mario (and Luigi maybe) must do: save the last Toad… So our heroes will need to explore the new areas beyond the unknown, where the Sun’s illumination doesn’t show. . .

Features:
- New 33 levels
- Some sprites and color palette have been modified
- Mario, Goombas, Koopas… Almost everyone are a bit faster!
- Red mushroom it’s a bit more powerful; you can throw (slow) fireballs!
- Goombas now can revive if you crush them
- Coins value are now 2 instead of 1
- And more stuff!

name: Atari Flashback 3
description: The Atari Flashback 3 was manufactured by AtGames, and was released in September 2011. The Flashback 3 includes 60 built-in Atari 2600 games, 2 joysticks, and a case design that is similar to the Flashback 2. Unlike its predecessors, the Flashback 3 uses emulation.

name: 5:48AM
description: It's 5:48 AM, and everything is about driving back home before the effects of all the alcohol you've absorbed kick in...

name: Atari Flashback 4
description:
The Atari Flashback 4 was released by AtGames on November 13, 2012. The console looks similar to its predecessor, but includes wireless joystick controllers. Like its predecessor, the Flashback 4 uses emulation. The console increased its library to 75 games, 15 more than the Flashback 3.

AtGames also released several alternate versions, including the Atari Flashback 4: 40th Anniversary Deluxe Edition. This included a set of replica Atari 2600 paddles, five collectible posters, and a copy of the original Atari joystick patent signed by Nolan Bushnell. AtGames also developed the Atari Flashback 64, a Walmart exclusive version with wired controllers and only 64 games, including Space Invaders. Some versions of the Flashback 4 include a 76th "bonus" game, Millipede.

name: Metroid: Crocomire's Last Stand
description:
METROID: CROCOMIRE’s LAST STAND is Roebloz’s second Metroid: Zero Mission hack, this time starring the X parasite mimic SA-X in an alternate timeline where Samus encountered an X instead of The Baby at the end of Metroid II: Return of Samus, taking down the last of the Space Pirates for complete galactic domination of the X!

The hack redesigns the whole map and has quite a few new tilesets, (Mostly from Super Metroid and Metroid Fusion) granting a brand-new experience that feels quite close to Super Metroid. The goal is to terminate Crocomire in the Dissolvery, which is locked behind 4 Security Locks, (Similar to Fusion) however one unique thing that this ROM hack does it that you have a great choice of which order you want to do things in. You could get Space Jump before even touching the Varia Suit, get the Plasma Beam as your second beam upgrade, everything is possible if you’re clever enough.

The major items also move around during a “CORE-X” playthrough, (This game’s equivalent to Hard Mode) granting even greater replay value, especially to get those nice ending pictures. And yes indeed, the player sprites have been changed to those of the SA-X from Fusion, making the hack the second one to ever have custom Samus graphics in Zero Mission. The length of the hack is pretty short, (Around 2 hours) but going through all the endings and exploring the different paths of every difficulty could more than quadruple that. A full map is included with the download, with two different styles (And two different ones to reflect the changes in Hard Mode)

There are also other various ASM tweaks thanks to the talented ASM hackers of Metroid Construction, such as the Crocomire final boss being very close to Super Metroid’s, and the Fusion beams being ported back into Zero Mission.

So if you are looking for a refreshing Zero Mission hack with a Super Metroid vibe, this hack is for you!

name: Atari Flashback 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Atari Flashback 4: 40th Anniversary - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Atari Flashback 5
description: The Atari Flashback 5 was released on October 1, 2014. Like the previous two releases, it was built by AtGames. It is the same as the Flashback 4 with the infrared wireless joysticks, but it adds 17 more games, increasing the total to 92 games.

name: Atari Flashback 6
description: The Atari Flashback 6 was released on September 15, 2015. Like the previous three releases, it was built by AtGames. It is the same as the Flashback 5 with the infrared wireless joysticks, but it adds 8 more games, increasing the total to 100 games.

name: Super Mario: The Trip
description: In a romhack for SMW with 10 worlds, Mario goes on a journey in an unknown world.

name: Atari Flashback 7
description:
The Atari Flashback 7 was released on October 1, 2016. Like the previous four releases, it was built by AtGames. It is the same as the Flashback 6 with the infrared wireless joysticks, but it adds one more game - Frogger - increasing the total to 101 games.

The Atari Flashback 7 Deluxe includes two wired paddle controllers in addition to the wireless joysticks.

name: Atari Flashback 7: Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Magiopolis
description:
An traditional hack with 70 exits, HP system and custom graphics inspired by 8-bits classics.
In this hack you play as a fairy named Helena.
Help her recover her magic, and rescue her queen who was captured by a mysterious evil fairy!

name: Atari Flashback 8 Classic
description: The Atari Flashback 8 was released in September 2017, by AtGames. Several variations were released. A basic model, the Flashback 8 Classic, features 105 games and two wired controllers. The Flashback 8 Deluxe is identical, except that it includes a set of paddle controllers in addition to the joysticks.

name: Atari Flashback 8 Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Atari Flashback 8 Gold
description: Sin descripción

name: Atari Flashback 8 Gold Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Atari Flashback 8 Gold: Activision Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Atari Flashback 9
description: The Atari Flashback 9 was released on November 15, 2018, by AtGames. It includes two wired controllers and 110 games.

name: X-Drive
description:
A silly 6 years collab project, made by silly dudes, also there's 67 exits

This hack features levels from 2017 to 2023 with a decent amount of variety among them, with the inspiration from a bunch of other hacks (mostly japanese hacks such as VIP Marios) and some silly ideas we came up with.
Quality may vary, hopefully you can enjoy it.

name: Atari Flashback 9 Gold
description: The Atari Flashback 9 Gold includes 120 games and wireless controllers.

name: Atari Flashback X Deluxe
description: The deluxe model includes 10 additional games.

name: Kuso Ecstasy
description:
This hack is all about diving into the disassembly and memory map to create unique gimmicks. Every level is a single room that has vanilla mechanics except for one outrageous thing. It's meant to be fun and mischievous, but at times mind-bending and unforgiving. This old school style of hacking draws a lot conceptually from Game Genie codes and emulator cheats. It's inspired by joke hacks, kuso, and old Japanese hacks alike.

Also there's 65 exits.

name: Atari Flashback 50th Anniversary Edition
description:
The Atari Flashback 50th Anniversary Edition was released in 2022 at limited retailers. Physically it is a slight re-coloration of the Atari Flashback X. It features brass switches instead of chrome and has the Atari 50th logo stamped onto its wood veneer trim. Like the previous releases, it was built by AtGames.

The basic model includes two wired standard controllers and 110 games. The gold model includes two wired standard controllers, two wired paddle controllers and 130 games.

name: Atari Flashback 50th Anniversary Edition Gold
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Nothing World
description:
The gameplay is fun and simple, but varied.

There are 3 worlds: standard, platforming, and kaizo. Players can choose which worlds they want to play. Also there are optional secret levels: cape, water, motor skills, and more. These levels don't unlock more levels, and they aren't necessary to see the credits. Also, there are many fast strats built into the levels to reward continued play.

name: Atari Flashback Portable
description: In 2007, Vendel was working on a handheld console known as the Atari Flashback Portable. It would run on three "AAA" batteries, and would include a screen resolution of 320x240. It would feature AV output and two joystick controller ports for multiplayer. Games are loaded into internal 2MB memory by use of a USB cable. The release date was projected as early 2008 with a retail price of approximately $40. However, Vendel announced in 2010 that the project was not going to be released by Atari and no further information was released.

name: Super Whatever Quest!!!
description:
Almost 3 years in the making, this is a spiritual successor to Super Nothing World, and Mario is on a picaresque journey to save the Mushroom Kingdom... or whatever.

I've incorporated some RPG elements into this hack. There's exploration, leveling up, and multiple endings. My idea was to make the dragon coin system from JUMP 1/2 into a central gimmick.

Level design styles include everything from standard: easy to kaizo: intermediate. Like most of my hacks, this pushes the boundaries between kaizo and standard. This is a hack that boldly proclaims, "Kaizo needs more fishin' boo." Let this be a warning.

My goal is to create a fresh experience that's accessible to kaizo players. If you decide to take up this challenge, I hope you enjoy!

name: Atari Flashback Portable
description: The third edition of Atari Flashback Portable.

name: Rakugaki Mario
description:
Rakugaki Mario is a love letter / pastiche / new(?!?!?!) romhack inspired by many hacks from the 2007-2009 era. What originally started as a semi in-joke between friends spiraled out into a much larger project, with a much larger author pool contributing levels (for better or worse). Making this hack semi-unique in nature is, in persuit of MAXIMUM AUTHENTICITY, all tools, sprites, blocks, and music (barring resources made specifically for the project) are from 2007-2009 too. That's right, we're talking Lunar Magic 1.63, JonWill's Blktool, MikeyK's Sprite Tool 1.22, and Romi's Addmusic 4.04. Of course, this wouldn't be playable on hardware by default. To comply with SMWC standards, only the fixed version is available below (in both Japanese and English). It contains the usual modern hack fixes (FastROM, QoL adjustments, Blktool Optimizer, ect), but that doesn't mean it's any less difficult! For SNESGT and ZSNES enthusiasts, you can also play the original unfixed (Japanese) version through this handy link right here. One may be quick to compare this to one of my previous hacking endeavors, but this is a very stylistically different hack that goes in a different direction. If you were a fan of that hack, you may not be particularly pleased that it isn't a continuation / sequel, but I did try to throw a bone in a level or two. Regardless, I still expect this hack to be very difficult. An Author List for individual levels can be found here. Be mindful of spoilers!

Difficulty curve is practically nonexistent, and levels explore various design styles, so you'll never know what's next. Whilst tagged as a Kaizo hack, take solace in the knowledge that this is primarily a Standard: Very (Very) Hard hack. However, because certain levels are played in a style and way agreed upon today to be "Kaizo" (one hit kill, levels played in a strict way, and lots of trial and error), I felt it was a necessity to tag it as such for the unwitting moderator or player who wishes to tackle such a hack.

name: Atari Flashback Portable
description: The fourth edition of Atari Flashback Portable.

name: Superstar Mario World
description:
After almost two and a half years, Superstar Mario World is finally finished

This is a traditional styled hack. With 7 Worlds and over 50 Levels. The plot is your typical Mario plot, but this time, Bowser has also kidnapped the Yoshies and Luigi!

name: Atari Flashback Blast! Vol. 1
description: You'll have a Blast! with this first volume of amazing Atari 2600 classics. Get rid of those pesky bugs in Centipede and Millipede. Battle the Qotile with your Zorlon Cannon in Yars' Revenge, then try it again in Yars' Return. Go on an epic adventure with all three Swordquest series games.

name: The Unworld
description:
Story: Bowser has tricked Mario into getting inside of a very strange glass box, called The Unworld. It is a very strange world in
there... Mario, inside, asks you to help get him out of there using the controller connected to the box. It is up to
you to lead Mario out of the Unworld and back to the real world in time to stop Bowser! Expect some humorous comments
and a some-what storyline within this.

To get to Bowser in the regular, just getting one normal exit after another path, will take you 33 exits. However, if you are a player
who likes looking for secret exits, finding new Overworld areas and paths, then you will have a whole 93 exits to find.
I only used Lunar Magic and the instant Death blocks in this hack, so I would call it a vanilla hack (I guess?) This hack
has, in my opinion and that of others', a very nice difficulty curve, where it is pretty easy in the beginning and slowly gets much much harder.
Many levels have hidden bonuses and secret surprises... So, what are you waiting for? Download this and have fun!

name: Atari Flashback Blast! Vol. 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Atari Flashback Blast! Vol. 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario's Strange Quest
description:
Finally, the moment some of you have been waiting for. After six months of hard work, I present the full version of Mario's Strange Quest! Now for the actual description:

In Mario’s Strange Quest, formally known as Super Mario World Custom 2, Mario embarks on a quest to find the seven Yoshi eggs that Bowser stole. Why did Bowser steal the eggs in the first place? You have to play to find out! If you thought this will be a typical quest, you thought wrong. You won’t always know what to expect; what kind of bizarre obstacles will Mario face on his journey?

This hack features:
-Custom Graphics
-Custom Music
-66 Levels
-79 exits
-Lots of Level Variety

name: Mario's Return
description: A full hack, with 10 worlds, somewhere around 65 levels, and 87 exits. Has a lot of custom graphics, though isn't exactly full of them. Not the best hack ever, by any margin, but I spent a very long time working on it, so I hope you enjoy it. Among its more original features are a new bonus game and several new or tweaked boss fights, with a new final boss, as well.

name: Peach is Missing
description: A romhack for Super Mario World with 77 exits

name: Bullymario's New Super Mario World
description: Mario and Luigi take a great adventure in a New Land with 80 exits.

name: Same Sprites, Different Levels
description:
"hmm what if i removed everything in a level except for the sprites and made the level around them" is what I asked myself one day, before deciding to do a whole hack about that for some reason.

-The name is pretty self-explanatory: Levels built around the sprites already in them.
-There have been some minor-ish changes to spice things up, also, and the star world & special world levels are completely original.
-This hack's aimed at people that are new to SMW hacks or haven't played any, so it starts out pretty simple, but ramps up, with the post-game being much harder.
-There's 92 exits

name: Super Mario Dream World
description:
Plot: While Mario & Luigi were chasing after Bowser's minions, they find a way into the Subcon. While they're there, they hear that Wart's back.

Features
-Wall Jump
-SMB2 Health Bar
-Custom Music
-OW Coin Counter
-59 exits

name: Bits and Pieces
description:
A very difficult romhack for SMW with 58 exits
This hack was made by levelengine

name: SA-1: Special Adventure - 1
description: A romhack for SMW with 118 exits

name: Takua 64
description:
Takua 64 is a major total conversion mod for Super Mario 64 created by Superstupidy to bring the world of Bionicle into the N64 3D platforming era!

With environment and level design inspired by games like Metroid Prime, Tomb Raider, and of course, the many Bionicle games that had a huge influence on this game’s world.
MNOG,
MNOGII,
Bionicle the Game,
The Legend of Mata Nui,
and Tales of the Tohunga,
being primary examples.

With 99 “Toa Stones” to find and collect, Takua 64 is a very large romhack feturing 12 levels, each with multiple areas to explore and challenges to overcome.

name: The Desolation
description: The Desolation brings a complete cross-platform co-op looter-shooter experience to PC and mobile devices. Make your impact across endless procedurally generated worlds via cooperative action combat, deep build customization and richly satisfying tactical gameplay.

name: Peanut's Journey
description: Embark on "Peanut's Journey" as Mr. Peanut! In this mild roguelike tower climb, face diverse challenges and the unknown. Can you strategically navigate each level and uncover Mr. Peanut's destiny?

name: Cardboard Hero
description: Play as the hero of a young child’s imagination and fight your way through a fantasy cardboard adventure in this 3rd person action-adventure. Fight wacky enemies and find treasure to help you as you explore the vast worlds.

name: Blush Blush: Kitsune Bundle
description: Three ancient fox-spirits. Three men forever linked by their rivalry… and by the curse they share. Three chances to experience falling in love like never before. This content requires the base game Blush Blush on Steam in order to play.

name: Zombie TD
description: "Zombie TD" is set on a planet ravaged by an apocalypse. The remaining human beings must resist waves of zombie invasion. Whether the human race can survive or not, commander, it is you who will lead your heroes to defend against the zombie invasion!

name: Horny Holiday
description: Dive into a festive romance in Horny Holiday! Play as Jack in a holiday encounter with the enchanting Joy at a Christmas party. Engage in a unique water, fire, wood challenge to win her heart, all wrapped up with captivating animations and a sound. Charm your way to a date before the lights dim!

name: Heads Off
description: Heads Off is a rather strange two dimensional arcade platformer, in which your character is a disembodied head that moves through the levels by yelling. Your objective? Go as far as you can through dangerous levels full of cliffs and other obstacles.

name: The Five Rivers Land
description: Mini campaign in DOOM 3 hell-style with three small to medium sized, dark and scary maps, D3 textures (needless to say) and some ambient sounds.

name: I No Longer Fear The Ranger Guarding My Heel
description: A large prototype-textured map with non-linear progression, slaughter fights, and trick jumping. Runs on the Copper mod, which is included. Originally intended as an entry for SM224.

name: Pale Peril
description: 1 copper map using hundreds of enemies and makkon textures.

name: Hatchepsout: The Hell Temple
description: Small to medium Egyptian temple

name: Cheyenne Mountain Complex
description: Large underground base map with some Quake2 textures.

name: Euclid's Nightmare
description: Venture deep into the darkest depths of my mind. Experience the torture and mental anguish that comes with these dangerous visions from my mind. Hence the title of this mod; Euclid's Nightmare. It features 20 brand-spanking-new maps all hand-crafted by me

name: Vestige of V'othlog
description: Vestige of V'othlog is a short four-level episode inspired by the classic themes of Quake. The pack was designed for 2021 re-release (KexQuake) but it has also been tested with Ironwail.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Invasions - Season of the Blood Moon
description: Invasions Season of the Blood Moon is underway! Be sure to take down the invading Nitara and add her blood-filled rewards to your kollection before the season ends on December 11.

name: Crazy Bullet
description:
Crazy Bullet is a variant of the arcade game Tank. As in that game, there is a top-down view of an arena containing two equally equipped tanks who engage in a fight to the death. Each tank can fire a bullet at a time, and move to avoid the opponent's fire. Contact with a bullet will destroy your tank, earning your opponent a point, and the first player to five points wins the contest.

The current game has a couple of important differences from the original. The most important is that bullets do not just travel in a straight line after you fire them. They move in the direction in which you last directed your tank. This allows you to fire around corners, and even to shoot yourself (gifting your opponent a free point). Secondly, there are a number of different arenas which can be chosen, with different wall layouts. Some of these layouts also include a turn-style which allows you to pass but stops any pursuing bullets. Finally there are two speed settings (for fast and slow bullets).

name: X-Piratez
description: X-Piratez is a total conversion mod designed for OpenXcom, a free open-source re-implementation of X-Com: Enemy Unknown (1994) and Terror From The Deep. There are major gameplay differences, as well as many additions to research, manufacture, base facilities, and so on. Piratez is designed for the veteran X-Com player seeking a much longer and challenging campaign.

name: Yip Quest
description: Fantasy comedy point and click game where you have to play three kobolds who have to steal some treasury.

name: Olivia's Bad Day
description: Olivia's had the worst day at work. Do whatever it takes to give her some much needed stress-relief.

name: Long Hike with a Cute Girl
description: Grace asked you to come with her on a quiet early morning hike, but her tight shorts and upbeat attitude make it seem like maybe she has a little more in store for you...

name: Paranormal Inc.
description: After looking for a job for a long time, you started as an operator in a company named "Paranormal Inc." You will watch live CCTV footage and report the anomalies you see.

name: Sprites are 1derful
description:
"Sprite spam"

No term invokes more contempt. It's artificial difficulty. It's lazy. It's uninspired. Or so they say. And now... it's what this hack is about.

name: Super Mario World: A Super Mario Adventure 3
description:
Story: After the events of Super Mario Adventure 2, Mario and Luigi return home after getting some delicious cake from Princess Peach's castle. They have just moved into a new house so Mario starts unpacking, Luigi starts reading a newspaper. Luigi sees a scam ad in the newspaper telling them how they can “get rich quick.” Mario heads out to see if this scam is real or not.

On his way there, he trips and falls into a deep Cavern and stumbles upon a magical gem, 1 of 12 Gems of Good Game Design. Almost immediately after picking up the gem Mario is sent to Glitch World, and is told by a mysterious figure that he must collect the scattered gems before it’s too late, or else everyone, and everything will become a glitchy mess and the cartridge will get fried.

An adventure awaits! Have fun, don't die! Btw there's 94 exits.

name: Super Mario World: A Super Mario Adventure 2
description:
The sequel to Super Mario Adventure 1 that KaidenThelens made in about 5 months for a good friend SuperStu!

Mario and Luigi have been invented to the castle by the Princess to celebrate their 35 birthdays. But then Bowser sends a Magic Koopa over to Mario House, and sends Mario to a faraway island, and Kidnaps Luizi and the Princess! Get to Bowser's Castle and save the day! (and the cake.)

Also there's 69 exits.

name: Dice Duel
description:
You've been greatly offended by Sir Robert but can't duel him ... unless Miss Ara has a plan for you, and she does.

Win 3 duels to finish this short game mixing math, randomness and narration!

name: Super Little Miss A.D.D. World
description:
Super Little Miss A.D.D. World is designed to teach basic fundamentals of Super Mario World to a relatively inexperienced player. This hack is dedicated to my daughter who would play Vanilla with me, but could only play Yoshi's Island 1, Yoshi's Island 2, and Star Road 2. There's no chocolate. However there are memes, jokes, emotes, tributes, some light-hearted trolling, and even a puzzle. There's also guest levels coming from some incredibly talented individuals, including 2 from Little Miss A.D.D. herself!

The design is to be a teaching hack, while not appearing to be a teaching hack, and can be played as a beginner alone, played together with a friend, or even as an experienced player looking for some lighthearted fun. This hack has 5 main levels, each focusing on teaching differing skills with a goal of preparing a player for Vanilla SMW or most easy to normal hacks. "Home" teaches basic fundamentals such as moving, running, jumping, carrying items, switches, and simple problem solving. "The Underground" adds skills such as enemy behavior, simple platforming, Yoshi ditching, and boss fights. "The Sky" teaches all about simple cape mechanics and other methods of flying. "The Forest" teaches simple puzzles, types of level design, and autoscrollers. "The End" is an ultimate test of all the skills taught.

Each of the first 4 levels contain hidden exits to "The Fun Islands", which are fun levels designed to reinforce various skills taught.

If you can find it, there's also a 6 exit mini Kaizo: Intermediate hack hidden within. Each level is based off of a memory I have with various streamers that I consider friends, and this is dedicated to them.

75 exits, 47 moons/coins = 100%
83 exits, 47 moons/coins = 111%

name: Ultimate General: American Revolution
description: American Revolution is a sandbox strategy game featuring the epic historical period during the rebellion of the American colonies against the British Empire. Take on the role of the British or American Colonists, and fight for territorial control over North America. A gripping real-time campaign awaits you on a detailed 3d map where you can build your army and navy, construct military infrastructure, and fully command your armies on a regimental level. If you want even more action you can fully zoom-in and fight massive battles on a battalion level.

name: Kingdom Hearts II: Nobody May Cry
description: Sin descripción

name: Ruindog
description: After centuries of invincibility, it became popular for humans to watch live alien hunting shows, participate in alien hunts, save up money, equipment, and use all the loot you find to move on to new maps and defeat more powerful enemies.

name: Puzzle Planet
description: Puzzle Planet offers a unique blend of puzzle-solving and world exploration, perfect for solo players and groups of friends. This game invites players to embark on a virtual world tour, piecing together jigsaw puzzles that feature stunning real-world locations from every corner of the globe.

name: Boost Buddies
description: Boost Buddies is a hardcore action reflex game. Test yourself in this deceptively cute challenge and reach the top of leaderboards!

name: Dark City: London Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Witch's Library
description: Help Vivian, the librarian witch, pick out her customer's ideal books by matching the genre they want to the books the library carries!

name: Liminal Memory
description: Walking simulator, where you finish levels to recover your memories. Firstly started as 1 month visual project, ended up being complete game. Features PSX graphics and liminal aesthetic as main style.

name: Dino Mayhem
description: Cause mayhem in this retro platformer by devouring people and destroying vehicles to earn points.

name: Dream of the Star Haven
description:
Dream of the Star Haven is a 1st person “giant leap” platformer with elements of exploration puzzling and light combat - a magical odyssey through islands in the sky where you soar gracefully and eventually even bend gravity itself to your will, giving you the power to literally turn the dreamlike world upside-down.

Explore awe-inspiring floating islands with gravity-defying agility. Discover the stars scattered across the islands using your magical scanner to reveal hidden celestial secrets.

In this captivating land, you're invited into a serene journey where you to traverse the floating archipelago in search of secrets, to liberate that which has been unjustly taken.

The game introduces a mesmerizing combination of a mighty triple-leap ability and a magical scanner, both essential tools for navigating the world.

Discover the stars scattered across the islands using the magical scanner helps you on your main quest, while other side quests and secret collectibles are more elusive. As you progress through each realm, you uncover mysteries of a lost era.

Immerse yourself in a unique blend of soothing exploration, graceful platforming, and a dreamy atmosphere. Savor the expansive vistas and uncover all that's hidden among the floating islands. With its emphasis on relaxation, exploration, and light combat and puzzle solving, the game provides an oasis of tranquility and is the perfect game-between-games when you need a break from big, noisy and chaotic gameplay.

Cruise through the low-stakes core of the game, or challenge yourself with the more difficult collectathon of secret challenges!

Embrace the joy of a harmonious journey as you leap toward the stars and reach toward a higher Dream of the Star Haven

name: Mall Heist
description: Dive into 'Mall Heist,' a real-time, voxel-based stealth game. Sneak, hack, and evade guards. Master gadgets, attacks, and hacks. Get caught, and it's game over – plan each move!

name: Forgotten Knight
description: It's a turn-based deck building RPG based on 2D dots. In an environment where attacks work differently on each turn, set the best strategy to defeat your enemies and upgrade your equipment to be stronger!

name: Life of Thife
description: Try to escape from the wanted city! Gather the necessary supplies by yourself and fend off the guards' pursuit! Cooperative guards are waiting for you at the checkpoints along the escape route.

name: Ace Racers SP
