description: Import, build, and export arena courses for space drone racing. Customize your ships thrust and rates, and work on your manual thrust skills.

name: Twistingo: Hummingbird Haven Collector's Edition
description: Restore paradise in 'Hummingbird Haven'! Uncover hidden nests, rescue animals, and rebuild a sanctuary. Your journey awaits in this thrilling hidden object fun with challenging puzzles!

name: Poozle Mania: Girls DLC #2
description: This DLC adds new mechanics to the game, as well as 3 more girls!

name: Hotel in the Dark
description: That's the day it all started on Sept. 13. 2020. In the early morning of the same day, I was already standing at the bus station, waiting for my bus. I had to travel a couple of three hundred kilometers to a small town. I found a hotel quickly. It was quite a modern building at first glance.

name: Potential
description: Experience everything that your senior year in college has to offer. Make decisions that shape your future. Class or fun? Work or party? Have a one-night stand or cultivate a relationship? Will you play it safe or take some chances? What if you want it all? Potential is a VERY adult visual novel.

name: Da Da Daungo
description:
A combination of Doubt and Bingo!
Use your brain to win!

name: Never be Afraid: Slam Dunk!
description: Never be afraid to Slam Dunk!

name: New Life of Aged Town
description: Be the mayor of this super aging town and fulfill the wishes of the old people.

name: Kirmis
description: In a clearing far away from any place, no matter how small... At the edge of the forest, the cart folds down. Play with your pocket knife, explore the world and admire nature. Or similar.

name: High School Hills: Dreams & Nightmares
description: Play as Bow, a teen who moves to High School Hills—where dreams and nightmares merge with reality. After your mother mysteriously vanishes, you're caught in a quest that spans two worlds. Encounter real-time combat, puzzles, and a choice-driven story in this top-down, pixel-art adventure.

name: SkyMatch
description: Use your battle-ready rover to race across the enormous landscape. Blow UFOs and aliens out of the sky with your top-mounted gun. If you love shooting and blowing things up, you'll love this open-world action game. Stunning graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5.

name: United Football
description:
United Football is a free to play, multiplayer, 5-a-side online football game.

United Football allows players to play in teams consisting of both human and AI players and boasts a unique control system and viewpoint that puts the gamer right in the action.

name: Cold War 2395: Solus
description: Cold War 2395: Solus invites you to explore an abandoned research outpost on a distant planet. Learn the secrets of the last person to venture there and uncover a galaxy-spanning conspiracy's origin.

name: Little Witch Academia: Project Luna
description: Little Witch Academia: Project Luna is a fan-made role-playing PC and VR video game by Ian JCV, Trota, and OcculusMalus based on Little Witch Academia. The game is currently under development.

name: Crystal Quest
description:
Game Boy Port of Crystal Quest.

Buckle in and gear up for the classic galactic ride of your life. Far beyond known galaxies, the stars are scattered with precious crystals. As a renegade outer space prospector, your job is to scoop 'em up and bring 'em home. Just one problem: The brilliant glow of these gems attracts some of the universe's foulest pests. We call them nasties - and they're just that. So go ahead...zap the intergalactic vermin and cash in on the crystals. It's nasty-blastin' fun.

name: The Last of Us Part II: Remastered
description: Experience the winner of over 300 Game of the Year awards now with an array of technical enhancements that make The Last of Us Part Il Remastered the definitive way to play Ellie and Abby's critically acclaimed story.

name: The Flintstones
description: In 1995, Sega Genesis port of Ocean's The Flintstones was released exclusively via the Sega Channel. Due to it's limited release, the port is mostly considered lost, with the only playable build existing being an early prototype build that was dumped December 31st, 2019. The prototype only features 2 levels and no sound.

name: Super Nin-e Sisters
description: Super Mario Bros. alternative art fangame.

name: Shin Nippon Pro Wrestling: Toukon Retsuden
description: Sin descripción

name: Catrina's Halloween Nightmare
description:
It's been three years since the Halloween Party massacre tragedy. Catrina wants nothing to do with Halloween, but her best friend Hope convinces her to attend a small reunion, she can't keep avoiding this night forever. Besides, what are the odds of the same thing happening twice? Grin Pumpkin is back.

The sequel to Jake's Halloween Night, a game inspired by old slasher movies.

name: Game.bps
description: A Mario game.bps developed by Wakana

name: Alex Jones: NWO Wars
description: Alex Jones: NWO Wars is an arcade-style video game that merges the worlds of political satire and retro gaming. In this title, players step into the shoes of Alex Jones, the well-known figure behind Infowars, as he battles through a series of levels inspired by his controversial broadcasts and political views.

name: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends: A Friend In Need
description: Oh no! The world's brattiest girl wants to adopt Bloo and rename him "Tiffany"! Keep Bloo safely in the arms of his friends until Mac arrives. Use the mouse to aim and toss Bloo with of three throwing options: short, medium and far.

name: Castle Defense
description: Defend the castle by buying different types of tanks to shoot the enemy. This is a game of strategy. It's not as easy as it looks! Check out other great tower defense games on our Tower Defense Games page!

name: HeroSmash
description:
HeroSmash was a Flash MMORPG developed by Artix Entertainment, using a modified version of the AdventureQuest Worlds engine. HeroSmash had a distinct art style and world setting based on superheroes and supervillains, rather than Artix Entertainment's traditional fantasy settings. Instead of using classes with unique abilities, players could equip any combination of abilities to suit their play style.

HeroSmash's public Alpha testing began in December 2010 followed by a public beta launch in April 2011. The game failed to gain traction outside of the company's core fans; paid subscriptions were removed in 2014, updates were discontinued in 2015, and the game never left its beta phase. HeroSmash was officially shut down in 2020 when browser support for Flash Player ended; players were able to access the game through alternate means for a time until the servers were completely removed.

name: Screwball Scramble
description: A fun browser game where you guide a marble through a tricky course without falling off the track. Your goal is to beat the clock and get the best possible score.

name: Pixel Room: Escape Game
description:
You are trapped in "somewhere". Solve all the mysteries and escape from here.

This game is different from ordinary escape games in that you are trying to escape by solving the rules of the room.

At first, you may not understand what is going on, but if you do certain things, the whole picture of the room will be revealed little by little.

Aim to escape while understanding the rules of the room little by little.

name: Touhou 1: The Highly Responsive to Prayers NES Demake
description:
From the programmer that brought you Chuhou Joutai, Drillimation Systems brings you a port of the game that helped kickstart a global internet sensation.

Once upon a time, there were two races that ruled over Gensokyo (The Land of Illusions): humanoids and youkai. They both helped bring peace to the world. One day, war broke out between the two races. The humanoids were largely unsuccessful, as the youkai dominated over Gensokyo. During the battle, an important landmark in the eastern part of the land was destroyed: the Hakurei Shrine.

Underneath the rubble, a young shrine maiden named Reimu Hakurei emerges. You are destined to go out and punish the one responsible. But, there are two paths to take. Armed with a mighty wand, an infinite supply of throwing amulets, and a yin-yang orb, you must make your way across the Aetherworld (Makai) or the Netherworld (Jigoku). But, once you meet the Angel of Death, be sure to keep your stake sharp. And say your prayers!

Original by Team Shanghai Alice, adaptation by Drillimation Systems.

name: Karasu Meltdown
description:
Karasu Meltdown puts you into the elephant's foot of hell raven Utsuho Reiuji, who thought it'd be a fun idea to smash up the Palace of Earth Spirits!

But Satori's having none of it and sending all of her pets to stop her!
Shoot, dodge, bomb, and raise bullet hell in this caravan shoot 'em up!
This game was originally made in three weeks for the Gunner Parade '22 Winter League game jam.

name: United Penguin Kingdom: Huddle up
description: This free version of the United Penguin Kingdom covers the content from one-year in-game time. A city-building game where you build a penguin settlement and satisfy the various needs of your penguins while dealing with seals and killer whales.

name: Midnight Blanc
description: A horror game where you pilot a crude airplane over the North Atlantic.

name: The Walking Dead: Empires
description:
Cooperative survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world after a letas virus causes people to turn into zombies when they die and infects the people they bite. Game from the series franchise: The Walking Dead.
The game is web3 and can be found in the Gala Games store. Developed by Ember Entertainment

name: Fast as Duck
description: This is an Indie game developed by AalexDoesStuff. It is a 3d platformer made for speedrunning, and includes intentional bugs as one of the features in the game.

name: Telnet Shooting Collection
description: Experience the iconic cutscenes and music that are synonymous with Telnet titles ( Gaiares, Granada, Psychic Storm, and Avenger), whenever you want! This collection includes convenient features like save/load anywhere, rewind, and other quality of life upgrades.

name: Angel Hare's Learning Adventure
description: Join Angel Gabby and friends on an educational journey through the skies! Will you remember how to behave well with others? Or will you need to be taught an additional lesson?

name: Donny Donut 3
description: Donny's new adventure is taking you to the Cyber Lands, to save the world from the evil Mark Donald. With the help of Pixie, a pixel, Donny's going to travel through cities, data and clouds to find Donno and Donna, his siblings...

name: Dance Cube
description: Arcade rhythm game.

name: Elemental Dreams
description: In this game, you play as Yousotsuki, a 14-year-old boy who loves nature. But one day, a series of natural disasters struck, causing him to lose his entire family, with only him surviving. Since then, he has begun to question whether nature really loves him or not. He then decided to go to an uninhabited place and stayed there for who knows how long to find peace and quiet and be closer to nature. He had nothing to do but sleep and explore dream worlds of elements.

name: Shockwaves
description: Shockwaves is an online shooter game where music has an impact on the gameplay. The main game mode is 8 vs 8 point capture. Items that are gained when playing can be traded by players on the open market.

name: My Crazy New Fake Love Life
description:
You live in the shadow of your twin brother, the golden boy of your family. Though you’re perfectly content with that, when your brother gets into an accident and ends up in the hospital with amnesia, your parents have you step in to take his place at his elitist school.

Pretending to be your brother until he regains his memories, you find yourself now balancing complex relationships with three beautiful girls.

Can you successfully fool everyone and succeed with your entire family depending on you?

name: Destiny Saga
description: Sixteen years ago, the Montereys continent suffered a disaster from the Xorc crisis. The protagonist Rosen, with only a clue - a core chip from sixteen years ago, explores the continent again with his friends, trying to find out the cause of the crisis.

name: The Archivist and the Revolution
description:
A woman alone in a dying city, on a dying world. What will be left when it all falls apart?

The Archivist and the Revolution is a slice-of-life/romance/history simulator set in a far-future sealed city that has undergone cycles of destruction and revival. You play as Em, a middle-aged woman who is no longer an archivist, as she struggles with rent payments, chronic illness, and the remnants of past relationships.

name: School Evasion
description:
This small and simple project was made with the intention of being an assessment game for the Digital Games course at FAESA (Brazilian university center).

"What happened at this school?"

It's the first question a curious person would ask. That's why your mission is basically to explore this place and discover the mysteries that surround it, in quick and simple gameplay.

When you pass through these gates, you accept your destiny. You must find pieces that complete the puzzle that this school really is. With simple 3D gameplay, flashlight, batteries, and letters scattered throughout the school, it is up to the player to face their fears and accept this adventure. May the light guide you.

name: Carnival
description: In this adaptation of the original arcade game by Sega, try to prove your skill at hitting targets in a carnival shooting gallery. Shoot rabbits, ducks, and owls, but look out! Ducks can swoop down and eat your ammo Get extra ammo by shooting one of the "8"s. You'll have to hit all of the pipes spinning around then clear the board of animals before you can move on to the next level. The game ends when you're out of bullets.

name: Carnival
description: The goal of the game is to shoot at targets, while carefully avoiding running out of bullets. Three rows of targets scroll across the screen in alternating directions; these include rabbits, ducks, owls, and bonus items. If a duck target crosses the bottom row without being shot, it will come to life and begin flying down toward the player. Any ducks that reach the bottom of the screen in this manner will eat some of the player's bullets. Objects also periodically appear among the targets that will give the player extra bullets or points when hit. A spinning wheel with eight pipes sits above the rows of moving targets; these pipes and all targets must be shot in order to complete the round. At the end of each round, the player receives bonus points for all bullets remaining in his supply. He then plays a bonus round, where a large white bear with a target walks across the screen. Each time the bear is shot, it rears up for a second, then begins walking more quickly in the other direction. The object is to shoot the bear as many times as possible until it escapes off the screen. Following the bonus round, the next wave begins. Later bonus rounds add more bears to the screen. In higher levels, there are more duck targets and fewer extra bullet targets, putting a premium on accurate shooting. The game ends when the player runs out of bullets.

name: Grand Poo World III
description: Grand Poo World III is the third and final romhack in Barbarian's Grand Poo World series. The game is a continuation of Grand Poo World II, which is a Super Mario World romhack dedicated to Twitch streamer and YouTuber GrandPooBear.

name: Rage of Mages
description: This mobile Allods game is an absorbing step-by-step RPG in a wonderful fantasy setting revealing the prehistory of the world of Allods. Two levels of hero's research — a land map and a labyrinth of underground— give the character alternative possibilities of missions implementation.

name: Pilgrim's Peril
description: A rogue-like dungeon crawler for the Game Boy Color. Roll dice to move across randomised sets of regions, employing whatever random selection of treasures, abilities and paths you come across to strategically push through to respite. Learn tactics, earn trophies, and push to improve your high score as you uncover what little information you can about the curse that looms over the land.

name: Breaking Bad DS
description: Breaking Bad, as a Nintendo DS game, complete with 3D graphics and models. Master the art of the cook on your Nintendo DS system and prepare the perfect batch—lest you meet the wrong end of Gus. Hone your cook in both Singleplayer and Local Multiplayer Vs.

name: Strike Force Heroes
description: Strike Force Heroes is an oldschool arena shooter rebuilt with modern mechanics with full co-operative and PvP online multiplayer. It melds over the top action with epic story-telling in this intense remake of the hit Flash game.

name: Carnival
description: The goal of the game is to shoot at targets, while carefully avoiding running out of bullets. Three rows of targets scroll across the screen in alternating directions; these include rabbits, ducks, owls, and bonus items. If a duck target crosses the bottom row without being shot, it will come to life and begin flying down toward the player. Any ducks that reach the bottom of the screen in this manner will eat some of the player's bullets. Objects also periodically appear among the targets that will give the player extra bullets or points when hit. A spinning wheel with eight pipes sits above the rows of moving targets; these pipes and all targets must be shot in order to complete the round. At the end of each round, the player receives bonus points for all bullets remaining in his supply. He then plays a bonus round, where a large white bear with a target walks across the screen. Each time the bear is shot, it rears up for a second, then begins walking more quickly in the other direction. The object is to shoot the bear as many times as possible until it escapes off the screen. Following the bonus round, the next wave begins. Later bonus rounds add more bears to the screen. In higher levels, there are more duck targets and fewer extra bullet targets, putting a premium on accurate shooting. The game ends when the player runs out of bullets.

name: Road Runner
description: In Road Runner, the player takes control of the Road Runner. The Road Runner must run along the road, avoiding trucks, landmines, falling rocks, etc. and also not get caught by Wile E. Coyote. The Road Runner must also eat birdseed along the way or he will become faint and Wile E. will catch him. The Road Runner can earn points for eating the birdseed and also by making Wile E. get hit by trucks, falling rocks, etc. The Atari 2600 version has a difference from the other versions, in that the Road Runner isn't required to eat the birdseed but can do so for the points.

name: Omh
description: Short for Original Mario Hack, ~omh~ is the successor to the 2021 game, R-ACK. It is the 'is the missing letters of R-ACK'. It follows "The Plumber" as he explores OMHland.

name: Gu-L
description:
While on the road during a school trip, a class becomes stranded in the middle of a derelict forest when their bus abruptly crashes. Fending for themselves, they soon come across a mansion whose lone habitant is a stoic maid. Seeking shelter, they take refuge in the mansion, only for the stay to be anything but restful.

This surreal RPG-Maker horror game was a submission in the March 2001 edition of the monthly contest that Enterbrain would host. Gu-L won first place, with Hyogo's very own Yubu Yakushiro receiving 30,000円 as the prize.

name: Tobari Dream Ocean: Nightmare
description:
Dive into a nightmarish addition with ' Tobari Dream Ocean' – now featuring nightmarish versions of all stages!

After purchase, you'll have the option to switch to the Nightmare version from the title screen. The story remains fundamentally unchanged from the main storyline.

Nightmare! This is a game that CANNOT be recommended to any normal gamer.
For those who have conquered all of Tobari Dream Ocean's main stages and crave even greater challenges, this content is tailored for the true daredevils!

name: Sonic 3 & Knuckles Battle Race
description: Sonic 3 & Knuckles Battle Race is a competitive 2-player romhack of Sonic 3 & Knuckles. A creative use of technical limitations, the players are put into Sonic 3 & Knuckles' stages- however, the camera only follows the player who's the furthest ahead. When the camera scrolls past the other player, the former wins a point and the latter respawns. It's heavily inspired by the older Sonic 2 Battle Race, bringing polish and additions to the game formula, and putting it in Sonic 3's more complex levels. Note: this game is 2-player only, and it is unrelated to Sonic 3 & Knuckles' "competition" mode, which features exclusive levels.

The Land of Oz is in great peril. The evil Victor Vile has erected towers that consume the people, light, and energy of Oz itself. Protect Dorothy and Toto as they travel across Oz in hopes of finding a way home to Kansas.

Team up with the Scarecrow, the Tinman, and the Lion and use their powers to overcome great obstacles. But beware of the Wicked Witch and Victor, an Illiterati agent, who will stop at nothing to destroy you.

name: Live or Die
description: Live or Die is a real-time strategy game about a war battle between good and evil that takes place in the future. Mankind frantically expands into outer space and fights for the scarce energy source (uranium) on which they depend for survival. You, Dr. Whiet, leads a team of miners to land on the desolate planet of Mimas, ready to carry out a mining plan, but they are surprised to find human footprints in a valley. You are not alone. The story begins here.

name: 8bit Wars

The war between 8 bits computers has begun. You are CPC Amstrad models and must defend from Spectrum, MSX and C64 attacks. Place your computers at the best positions to avoid the enemies waves

Made for CPCRETRODEV 2021 contest. Tower defense game programmed in BASIC using 8BP library

First 8BP game in mode 1

And yeah, this is a really hard TD game. You have been warned.

Gameplay involves destroying each formation of aliens, who dive down towards the player in an attempt to hit them.

As in the earlier game, Galaxian featured a horde of attacking aliens that exchanged shots with the player. In contrast to Space Invaders, Galaxian added an element of drama by having the aliens periodically make kamikaze-like dives at the player's ship, the Galaxip.

description: Embark on a captivating journey back to the roots of medieval conflict with Medieval Machines Builder - First Siege. This free-to-play simulation game offers a taste of the grandeur and challenges that await in the full game. Design, build, and destroy. Medieval lethal weapons await you!

name: Catting Over It
description: Challenge your jumping skills and immerse yourself in the world of real jumping tactics. The stakes are high, remember, the higher you climb, the harder you fall, every mistake can teach you a valuable lesson, or not, but it will be fun!

name: Barbarous: Family Secrets
description: Help Emyr save the world in a Time Management game full of adventure and comedy!

name: Kingdom Rush Vengeance - Hammerhold Campaign
description: Hammerhold's in for a surprise: Vez'nan sends you with the mighty Dark Army fleet for a lightning strike on the desert shores, catching the Legionnaires off guard!

name: League of Speedrunners
description: League of Speedrunners is a third-person 3D platformer. An exciting competition for the title of the best speedrunner awaits you, where many missions are scattered across the open world. Play as different heroes, each with unique superpowers. Avoid traps and enemies.

Uncover the person's story through their items and secrets before making decisions. Your choices alter the city's destiny, and impact your revelation on Judgment Day.

description: This game is a soul born inspired action adventure RPG game. I want to make each character unique and flesh out their own story, background, personality then all of this will affect the character powers, type, talents, skills, fighting styles, and weapons.

name: Gold Knight
description: Start your Gold Knight adventure with 2.5D puzzles, Sokoban gameplay blended with exclusive challenges. Master the binary realm of Light and Darkness to forge powerful Gold Orbs. Survive the Darkness by using memory strategies and sound hints.

name: Necrophoresis

name: Dungeon Man

name: Descent from Arkov's Tower

name: Arcane Blood: The Shattered Star

name: Rise & Reign
description: Washed ashore on a strange medieval land, its up to you to choose your destiny. Harvest resources, craft weapons, and build your kingdom. Raid other players or work together. Serve the king or take the throne for yourself. This land is harsh, can you survive?

description: Panicore is a survival horror game that mixes permadeath, AI monsters and a co-op experience. Try to escape and don't get caught.

Hundreds of miles away across the ocean, you a young American working out of his parent's farm, learns of the fatal news that war in the Kingdom of Europe has broken out.

Save animals with each multiplication table completed and use their buffs to your advantage. Experience the visual novel like story to save the realm.

description: An online playable version of Othello that is playable in browser and via Android app.

description: Sin descripción

name: Hazeron Starship

Unleash hell in this unforgiving retro first-person shooter by wielding unique weapons, conquering challenging puzzles, and making the treacherous journey through the nine circles of HELL!

You score points for every balloon that hits the border. To score more points, chain up the balloons.

Position your units in a detailed 3D environment and skillfully aim your shots with physics-based weapons. Collect and combine items to build unique loadouts from over 50 wacky weapons and upgrades.

name: Only Up Samarkand
description: Only up Samarkand is a parkour game where speed and agility are important so as not to fall and start again! Reaching the end is an important milestone in the game.

description: Sunshine graces the farm and your birds are a fashion disaster. Breed vibrant ostriches by matching colors and patterns to complete unique orders. Earn valuable rewards and mutation points to enhance your farm's genetic diversity.

Craft gear to succeed in the next round and make the hero specific leaderboards! Unlock more heroes and story perspectives!

name: Prophecy

name: Grimhook

name: Chimp Quest: Spirit Isle
description: Swing into a heartwarming tale in Chimp Quest: Spirit Isle.

name: Duck's Most Terrible Day
description: A time-bending 2D platformer in the least amount of pixels possible.

name: Notice
description: NOTICE is a 7-10 minute short interactive experience that follows the story of having a panic attack, then using awareness and presence to overcome it. As you get home and start to breathe, you take control over your thoughts. By clicking on each object, you start to become aware of everything in your space and what it means to you. Each object has its own style, musical note and meaning - whether that be the can of soda lying on your desk or the guitar gifted to you from a friend back home.

name: Machine Match
description: In our near future you'll build one-of-a-kind battle machines with custom designs and emerging personalities to fight on stunning dioramas against competing players in an instantly gratifying isometric combat game that is fun for newcomers and great for veterans.

name: Nobody Nowhere
description: A side-scrolling, story-driven text adventure game in pixel art. The story is set in 2079, when a Replicant awakens in a lab facility amidst a life-or-death situation. The replicant aid agency tries to rescue him but fails. In the process they stumble on the real secret of the Replicant project...

name: Xelan Force
description: 8-bit style vertical scrolling shooting game Xelan Force. We aimed to create a game that you can enjoy over and over again, such as the feeling of play that changes between offensive and defensive types, and the ability to search for hidden items.

name: Guess the Word
description: Guess the 5-letter word in the 5 tries. If you don't, then you don't. You can try again.

name: Triadino
description: Triadino is a casual puzzle game inspired by Tetris and Rock-Paper-Scissors. Unique interactions between typed blocks make the game more interesting and challenging.

name: A Chocolate World
description: This is 3d platformer an unusual adventure, come inside a world of chocolates and desserts where every move can be fatal 4 levels each one differs from the other.. No save point the goal is to finish every level with absolute precision it's challenging it' has zero calories.... press f4 to quit game

name: Where the Music Dies
description: A short visual novel about dealing with loss. You explore a festival filled with old memories and regret. Where the voices of the dead never stay quite dead. Will you manage to change, before it's too late?

name: Idle Percent
description: Every upgrade in this game is a percent which is added to the upgradable value. Your progression is slow at the beginning but with time your income will become higher and higher! Buy prestige and super prestige upgrades to maximize your profit!

name: Smash and Bash Monsters
description: An addicting Clicker-Looter game where you defeat Thousands of monsters to loot equipment and get stronger, that can be as Relaxing or Frenetic as you like!

name: Recoil
description: Recoil is a minimalist 2D Platformer where you can only move by shooting. Find ways to escape the prison by solving puzzles and blasting (or sparing) enemies while collecting all the gems! But beware, The Wardens are watching...

name: Tunguska: Slaughterhouse
description: A wave defense mode set in a new location in Tunguska. Stop the waves of minions from energizing the Dark Disciple and destroying the Zone. Arm and supply yourself with Soul Stones left by your fallen foes. Use your creativity with all the gears in the game to outgun a seemingly undefeatable enemy.

name: Lawless Lands: Witchcraft
description: The Witchcraft DLC for Lawless Lands adds 3 new spells in a new spell class - witchcraft, which can be learned or gained through a staff or wand! Use your craft and trickery to bring your enemies down and bend the wrathful forces of nature to your will!

name: Big Klondike: Tri Peaks Solitaire

name: Train Simulator Classic: Southern Railway Retro Pack 01
description: Experience all the challenges and drama of railroading, Southern style, with the remarkable and content-rich Southern Railway Retro Pack 01 for Train Simulator Classic!

name: Fishing Planet: Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack
description: Exclusively for Thanksgiving, we present to you the Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack! It is your Horn of Plenty in the world of float fishing! Jam-packed with exclusive goodies, the Thanksgiving Cornucopia Pack features limited-edition telescopic rods that are available exclusively in this Pack!

name: Warm Snow: The End Of Karma
description: During the ten years of Bi'an's slumber in the Ash Of Nightmare, the malevolent god Helo was fully unleashed, bringing havoc to the world. The resistance force led by Linglong once glimpsed hope, but in the face of madness and despair, everything seemed so fragile...

name: Elite Comet
description: Elite Comet is a collision-based fighting game that revolves around strategic clashes and precise collisions. Master the art of combat as every collision shapes the intensity of the battles, offering a uniquely dynamic and thrilling gaming experience.

name: Aron's Adventure: Magic Reborn
description: A 3rd person action game! Save the world of Elor from ancient evil. Master archery, melee, and mystical abilities with the guidance of an ancient spirit. Fight enemies, solve puzzles, and craft gear. Choose your weapon, face epic bosses, and decide Elor's fate!

name: Classic Car Simulator Car Driving

name: Idle Champions: Eonstaryx the Time Dragon Familiar Pack

name: Paradox Guardians

Compete with one of the Superpersons to get a date with another Superperson, but you don't know who the other suitor is. Discover your nemesis, foil their plans, and get the date. (This is not an erotic game.)

name: Sexbot

name: Songs of Steel: Hispania

Build your camp, recruit and train soldiers and send them on missions to conquer territories against your opponent. This online mode includes 10 maps, all 6 biomes and features such as minimap, voice chat and drone attacks.

description: ParryRobot is a 3D action game where you play as a tiny but agile robot, “PAR 12-H”. Using the game’s “Parry System”, you are tasked with overcoming the mysterious, hulking “TB 001-L”…a massive automaton who’s set its eyes on your metallic hide!

name: Zombie Sanctuary: Juliet
description: In the ancient Middle Ages, a lot of zombies have appeared in an abandoned village. As a member of the Seabird Strike Team, you were reasonably assigned to check it out. Your captain gives you a total of 6 different weapons that you need to use to defeat hordes of zombies.

name: Time Hunters: Curse of the Golden Idol
description: Are you ready?! Make some noise (and some enemies) in this action-packed party shooter for 4! Utilize your unique energy shots, power-up your attacks with an array of pick-ups, and get set to take down the competition!!

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: John Riccitiello Pack
description:
A parody mod that adds the Unity civilization with its Leader John Riccitello.
Playing as him gives you:

- Unique neighborhood district (Microtransactions Store)
- Unique unit (Data Analyst)
- Changes how great architects work for everyone on the match
- Develops a unique system of obtaining gold via total number of civilizations met
- And much more!

name: Slave Zero X: Calamity Edition
description:
Slave Zero X is a stylish 2.5D character action game set in the biopunk world of Slave Zero (1999). Run & Slash your way through a dystopian future in this character action game which will resonate with fans of Devil May Cry, Strider, and Guilty Gear.

Slave Zero X: Calamity Edition includes:

The Standard Edition physical game
All the contents included in the Standard Edition (Guidebook, Control Card, and exclusive skin)
An Exclusive Artbook which also includes a comic (in English)
3 art cards
2 CDs with the Original Sound Tracks of Slave Zero X as well as the original Slave Zero game!
All contents packaged in a collectible tuck-in box

name: Lamprey
description:
Fang couldn't be happier about her new job at the prestigious tech startup Riverstone, Inc. When she starts on her new team, building a revolutionary workplace assistant AI called Lamprey, she jumps into her work head-first.

However, it's not long before things start going wrong, with a software bug causing Lamprey to trap the team in their office. Will Fang and her co-workers be able to escape a prison of their own making?

name: Livets Hopp

name: Enough Sheep
description:
The wolves are following the innocent sheep! Your job is to push them inside the circles to make them disappear.

This game was developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2023 with the theme "Roles Reversed"

name: Bowmen
description: Bowmen followed the trend that began in the early 90s of offering simple games with nude images, although in this case with naively “spicy” scenes. Released in 1994, it is a psychedelic game of skill, in which the story of a somewhat “peeping tom” boy, who is converted into a kind of angel by divine grace, is shown as an introduction.
